ARTICY.DFr_1BF2963F_0x0100000900008C65.Text: ไม่ว่าเจ้ามีเรื่องสำคัญอันได ไปหาซาบุโรเบ เขารับผิดชอบที่นี่ เจ้าเพียงแค่ต้องขึ้นไปบนเนินเขา เจ้าก็จะพบกับคฤหาสน์ของเขา
ARTICY.DFr_F07945BB_0x0100000F00003689.MenuText: ข้าได้เผชิญหน้ากับเค็นเงียว เขาพูดอะไรถึงข้าหรือเปล่า?
ARTICY.DFr_F07945BB_0x0100000F00003689.Text: ข้าได้เผชิญหน้ากับเค็นเงียว เขาพูดอะไรถึงข้าหรือเปล่า?
ARTICY.DFr_993A8CAA_0x0100000D000013D9.Text: ก็ เขาอาจจะมีความขุ่นแค้นใจกับเจ้า แต่ทุกคนกลับคิดว่า เจ้ากล้าที่จะยืนหยัดเพื่อเด็กคนนั้น
ARTICY.DFr_BC8DE672_0x0100000D000013E0.MenuText: เขาหิว แล้วก็กลัว ข้าต้องช่วยเขา
ARTICY.DFr_BC8DE672_0x0100000D000013E0.Text: เขาหิว แล้วก็กลัว ข้าต้องช่วยเขา
ARTICY.DFr_8BDA658F_0x0100000D000013ED.Text: บางคนบอกว่าเจ้าไม่ยุติธรรมกับเค็นเงียว แต่ข้าบอกได้เลยว่าตาเฒ่าโง่นั่น สมควรได้รับมันแล้ว ขออภัยที่ข้าหยาบคาย
ARTICY.DFr_F56DFAF3_0x0100000F00003691.MenuText: มัตสึมารุพูดอะไรถึงข้าหรือเปล่า?
ARTICY.DFr_F56DFAF3_0x0100000F00003691.Text: มัตสึมารุพูดอะไรถึงข้าหรือเปล่า?
ARTICY.DFr_406DD512_0x0100000D000013F4.Text: ใช่ ธุระของเจ้ากับผู้เฒ่าฮิโกเบ มัตสึมารุเป็นคนชอบการกระซุบกระซิบ เขาบอกทุกคนว่าเจ้าทำอะไร
ARTICY.DFr_FB0C0EE1_0x0100000D000013FB.MenuText: ข้ายังไม่รู้ว่าสิ่งที่ข้าทำลงไปถูกต้องหรือไม่
ARTICY.DFr_FB0C0EE1_0x0100000D000013FB.Text: ข้ายังไม่รู้ว่าสิ่งที่ข้าทำลงไปถูกต้องหรือไม่
ARTICY.DFr_60FC5BEC_0x0100000D00001773.Text: ชายชราทนทุกข์แต่ยังมีชีวิตอยู่ ครอบครัวของเขาจะรู้สึกขอบคุณ พวกเขาจะพูดถึงเจ้า เช่นเดียวกับมัตสึมารุ
ARTICY.DFr_A31BE5B1_0x0100000F000036CE.Text: มันเป็นการตัดสินใจที่ยากลำบาก แต่เจ้ามีความกล้าที่จะทำมัน นี่คือสัญลักษณ์ของผู้นำ
ARTICY.DFr_236B9104_0x0100000F00000655.Text: โคนิจิวะ อะไรทำให้เจ้ามาที่นี่?
ARTICY.DFr_FAF7384B_0x0100000D00001089.MenuText: ขออภัย ข้าเป็นหนึ่งในผู้ตั้งถิ่นฐานใหม่ที่อยู่ในโซโซกี
ARTICY.DFr_FAF7384B_0x0100000D00001089.Text: ขออภัย ข้าเป็นหนึ่งในผู้ตั้งถิ่นฐานใหม่ที่อยู่ในโซโซกี
ARTICY.DFr_F1AD83F2_0x0100000D00000D33.Text: อ๋อ! ข้าได้ยินมาว่า มีผู้มาใหม่บางคน กำลังกอบกู้ซากปรักหักพังเก่าแก่ที่น่าสงสารนั้นขึ้นมาใหม่!
ARTICY.DFr_C7F3A5A8_0x0100000D00000D3A.Text: แล้วไอ้เฒ่านั่นล่ะเป็นไงบ้าง?
ARTICY.DFr_387C2E03_0x0100000D00000D41.MenuText: หมายถึงใคร?
ARTICY.DFr_387C2E03_0x0100000D00000D41.Text: หมายถึงใคร?
ARTICY.DFr_874811FC_0x0100000D00000D49.Text: อ้าว ก็ไอ้เค็นเงียว อดีตสามีของข้าไง การหย่ากับมันคือการตัดสินใจที่ดีที่สุดในชีวิตของข้าเลยนะรู้ไหม
ARTICY.DFr_64AC33C0_0x0100000D00000D50.Text: ตอนนี้ข้าแต่งงานใหม่แล้ว กับอิโนโกะ เขาเป็นคนดี เขารวย แล้วเขาก็ไม่ฆ่าสัตว์เพื่อความสนุกสนานด้วย
ARTICY.DFr_FFD8856B_0x0100000D00000D5C.Text: พระพุทธองศ์ทรงตรัสว่า จงมีความเมตตาต่อสรรพสัตว์ทั้งหลาย
ARTICY.DFr_2D6768F7_0x0100000D00000D57.MenuText: แต่ในเชกิก็ยังมีนักล่าอยู่ใช่ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_2D6768F7_0x0100000D00000D57.Text: แต่ในเชกิก็ยังมีนักล่าอยู่ใช่ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_743B8A26_0x0100000D00000D66.Text: เมื่อเจ้าฆ่าสัตว์เพราะเจ้าหิว ก็สามารถแก้ตัวได้ แต่กับเค็นเงียว... เขาก็แค่ชอบฆ่า
ARTICY.DFr_AA5210DE_0x0100000D00000E5D.Text: ที่นี่ งานเกี่ยวกับสัตว์ที่ตายแล้วส่วนใหญ่ จะเป็นของคนที่อาศัยอยู่ในหมู่บ้านใกล้เคียง พวกเขาเป็นคนดี แม้แต่อะเปนันกะ
ARTICY.DFr_29FCCC92_0x0100000D00000F14.Text: นางคือ... เจ้าก็รู้... นางไม่ใช่คนแบบพวกเรา
ARTICY.DFr_FB497CD2_0x010000090000AFC7.MenuText: ชิบายามะคือใคร?
ARTICY.DFr_FB497CD2_0x010000090000AFC7.Text: ชิบายามะคือใคร?
ARTICY.DFr_F24BD886_0x010000090000AFE4.Text: เขาเคยเป็นชูโกได เขาบริหารศักดินาเหล่านี้ให้ไดเมียว
ARTICY.DFr_5A5B109C_0x010000090000B050.Text: แต่แล้วสงครามระหว่างเผ่าก็เกิดขึ้น
ARTICY.DFr_2AEED96E_0x010000090000B057.Text: เขาใช้ประโยชน์จากความวุ่นวาย แล้วยึดอำนาจมาเอง!
ARTICY.DFr_FD81C055_0x0100000900001045.Text: มีอะไรหรือเปล่า?
ARTICY.Dlg_85C27FDE_0x0100000700002861.Text: Nothing more to say after defying Kengyō
ARTICY.DFr_F80A1CB4_0x0100000A00000023.MenuText: เรือข้ากับเพื่อนอับปาง พวกข้าเกือบตาย เจ้าช่วยเราตั้งถิ่นฐานที่นี่ได้ไหม!
ARTICY.DFr_F80A1CB4_0x0100000A00000023.Text: เรือข้ากับเพื่อนอับปาง พวกข้าเกือบตาย เจ้าช่วยเราตั้งถิ่นฐานที่นี่ได้ไหม!
ARTICY.DFr_3D646760_0x0100000A00000050.Text: อ๋อ ได้ ตามเจ้าขอ ข้าเห็นวิธีที่เจ้าดูแลเพื่อนของเจ้า มันช่างซาบซึ้งยิ่งนัก บอกว่าข้าอาจมองเจ้าผิดไปในตอนแรก
ARTICY.Dlg_0FCE19F2_0x0100000700002837.Text: Haven;t talked to Kikumatsu yet OR talked to Kikumatsu, but you're hiding it (haven't hunted hare yet)
ARTICY.Dlg_EBAFF542_0x01000007000027B6.Text: Trzeba zasugerować jak ta decyzja uzasadnia pozyskanie przez ciebie reputacji w wiosce. Może niech Kengyo powie coś w stylu -- pewnie wielu się spodoba twoje zachowanie, ale ja gardzę takimi miękiszonami. After Kikumatsu ate the meat. Defy Kengyō
ARTICY.DFr_1FF4E5E9_0x010000090000800C.Text: ข้ายินดีที่จะต้อนรับเจ้าที่นี่ ถ้ามันขึ้นอยู่กับข้า... แต่มันไม่ใช่ ผู้ตั้งถิ่นฐานใหม่ต้องได้รับอนุญาตจากสภาหมู่บ้าน
ARTICY.DFr_3F869A59_0x0100000A0000005E.MenuText: เจ้าหมายถึงมีสภาที่ดูแลซากปรักหักพังเหล่านี้งั้นเหรอ?
ARTICY.DFr_3F869A59_0x0100000A0000005E.Text: เจ้าหมายถึงมีสภาที่ดูแลซากปรักหักพังเหล่านี้งั้นเหรอ?
ARTICY.DFr_8D6FB1A1_0x0100000900008013.Text: ใช่ ทำไมจะไม่หละ
ARTICY.DFr_796885EC_0x0100000F00003873.MenuText: แต่หมู่บ้านนี่เป็นหมู่บ้านอยู่อีกเหรอ?
ARTICY.DFr_796885EC_0x0100000F00003873.Text: แต่หมู่บ้านนี่เป็นหมู่บ้านอยู่อีกเหรอ?
ARTICY.DFr_E843DB82_0x0100000A00000066.Text: ข้าเดาว่าอย่างนั้น แต่... เจ้ารู้ไหม เจ้าอาจจะกำลังเข้าสู่บางสิ่งบางอย่าง หมู่บ้านนี้ยังอยู่และยังไม่ถูกเพิกถอน...
ARTICY.Dlg_3AB3D476_0x010000070000275A.Text: Explains he's in the middle of training. Complete TalkToKengyo. Get TalkToKikumatsu
ARTICY.DFr_8C107B06_0x0100000A00000075.MenuText: แต่ไม่มีสภาหมู่บ้านที่สามารถปฏิเสธพวกข้าออกไป!
ARTICY.DFr_8C107B06_0x0100000A00000075.Text: แต่ไม่มีสภาหมู่บ้านที่สามารถปฏิเสธพวกข้าออกไป!
ARTICY.DFr_D1294B40_0x0100000A00000089.Text: ข้าหมายถึง... ตรงนี้ตอนนี้ เจ้ากำลังเดินอยู่ในเส้นทางที่ละเอียดอ่อน แต่ข้าเดาว่าคงจะไม่มีอันตรายใด ๆ เกิดขึ้นกับส่วนที่เหลือของหุบเขา
ARTICY.DFr_520FF5FB_0x010000070000362D.MenuText: ดีเลย! งั้นข้าต้องเริ่มต้นที่ตรงไหน?
ARTICY.DFr_520FF5FB_0x010000070000362D.Text: ดีเลย! งั้นข้าต้องเริ่มต้นที่ตรงไหน?
ARTICY.DFr_61D675AC_0x0100000F00002ABE.Text: อืม หอระฆังก็พังแล้ว และมันก็เป็นหัวใจของหมู่บ้านซะด้วย หากปราศจากมัน มันก็เป็นเพียงดินแดนที่ถูกมอดไหม้
ARTICY.DFr_3D446F9A_0x0100000F00002AC7.MenuText: แล้วข้าสามารถสร้างมันขึ้นมาใหม่ได้ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_3D446F9A_0x0100000F00002AC7.Text: แล้วข้าสามารถสร้างมันขึ้นมาใหม่ได้ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_9658E7FE_0x0100000700003627.Text: นั่นอาจเป็น... เรื่องยาก แต่โชคดีที่ข้าพบระฆังเก่าในซากปรักหักพัง กำลังคิดอยู่ว่าจะแบกไปขาย แต่มันก็น่าเสียดาย
ARTICY.DFr_0C61BEEE_0x0100000700003673.Text: ข้าสามารถมอบให้เจ้า แต่ก่อนอื่นข้าต้องดูก่อนว่าเจ้า สามารถจัดการงานไม้ทั้งหมดได้จริง ๆ
ARTICY.DFr_BBB608B7_0x0100000F00002758.Text: หอระฆังจะออกมาดูดี เจ้าจะต้องมีผึ่งถากไม้ที่เหมาะสม เพื่อใช้มันทำไม้กระดานที่เรียบเนียนเสียก่อน
ARTICY.DFr_53508EF2_0x0100000F00003B5D.MenuText: ข้ามีวัสดุทั้งหมดสำหรับหอระฆังแล้ว
ARTICY.FFr_D4ADB3BD_0x010000070000233F.Text: Talked to witch, gives a report.
ARTICY.FFr_E862DB7C_0x0100000700002260.Text: You forcefully make a case for settling. Turns out he saw you with Ako, how you helped her. Offers to give you guidance. Complete TalkToMan, Activate MQGetAdze
ARTICY.DFr_53508EF2_0x0100000F00003B5D.Text: ข้ามีวัสดุทั้งหมดสำหรับหอระฆังแล้ว
ARTICY.DFr_CC3E7D80_0x0100000F00003B64.Text: ขอข้าดูหน่อย...
ARTICY.DFr_7E807D8D_0x0100000F00003BAC.Text: ไม้กระดานเหล่านี้ดูหยาบไปนะ แต่ข้าว่าด้วยเครื่องมือดั้งเดิมนั่น เจ้าคงทำให้เรียบไปกว่านี้ไม่ได้แล้ว
ARTICY.DFr_8240F706_0x0100000700001EC3.Text: Well, I don't think she's going anywhere soon.
ARTICY.DFr_34DDC719_0x0100000700001E97.Text: You need to talk to Miko
ARTICY.DFr_BE77F764_0x0100000700001CBD.MenuText: May the kami bless you, dear.
ARTICY.DFr_BE77F764_0x0100000700001CBD.Text: May the kami bless you, dear.
ARTICY.DFr_34786085_0x0100000700001C93.Text: You should talk to Takumi, he's the only one who's skilled enough.
ARTICY.DFr_DEC6A6AC_0x0100000700001C7E.Text: Q13 5A Haven't talked to Takumi yet.
ARTICY.DFr_B73C6069_0x0100000700001C47.MenuText: These shrine decorations I bought from you...
ARTICY.DFr_B73C6069_0x0100000700001C47.Text: These shrine decorations I bought from you...
ARTICY.DFr_3918B394_0x010000070000189A.Text: The gods have accepted you, but the locals can be more stubborn. I think you should talk to them some more.
ARTICY.DFr_F4ABA3AB_0x010000070000188A.Text: Thank you for your help. Go back to Tadaaki, he will tell you what to do next.
ARTICY.DFr_A684625B_0x0100000700001876.Text: And it seems everyone else in the village agrees. Go to Tadaaki and tell him that. He won't resist anymore.
ARTICY.DFr_673FAB2A_0x0100000700001866.Text: I know. The gods are grateful. They say you can stop running. They want you here.
ARTICY.DFr_F2115261_0x0100000700001850.Text: Now it needs a sacrifice. I think some flowers will make for a suitable welcome-back gift.
ARTICY.DFr_7BAE8D0D_0x0100000700001838.Text: Yes, I’ve heard Jizo has finally listened to Takumi’s prayers and given him a successor…
ARTICY.DFr_1D082A63_0x010000070000182A.Text: I knew he would change his mind. He and his wife have always worshipped Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_1E7A2008_0x0100000700001824.MenuText: Takumi has agreed to help us.
ARTICY.DFr_1E7A2008_0x0100000700001824.Text: Takumi has agreed to help us.
ARTICY.DFr_9E86E348_0x0100000700001814.Text: Ah. He’s been going through a difficult time lately… Let’s hope he will reconsider this.
ARTICY.DFr_19B39742_0x010000070000180E.MenuText: Takumi doesn’t want to help with the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_19B39742_0x010000070000180E.Text: Takumi doesn’t want to help with the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_705E671B_0x01000007000017FB.Text: Yes, you shouldn't try it alone. Takumi has been bitter with Jizo for not blessing him with healthy children. But maybe you'll find a way to convince him?
ARTICY.DFr_A3DC6A63_0x01000007000017F4.MenuText: This will require a skilled craftsman…
ARTICY.DFr_A3DC6A63_0x01000007000017F4.Text: This will require a skilled craftsman…
ARTICY.DFr_466AE451_0x01000007000017ED.Text: Jizo will need a new shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_6F49F827_0x01000007000017DF.Text: Good. Welcome back, Jizo. Whatever we did to displease you, please forgive us. Take care of our households and our children and keep the roads safe.
ARTICY.DFr_AB83D731_0x01000007000017D9.MenuText: I have the statue and the add-ons.
ARTICY.DFr_AB83D731_0x01000007000017D9.Text: I have the statue and the add-ons.
ARTICY.DFr_1A3380CE_0x01000007000017C4.Text: We still need to reconstruct the shrine. You should go get the add-ons first.
ARTICY.DFr_ABA04512_0x01000007000017AE.MenuText: I have the statue of Jizo. Is everything in order now?
ARTICY.DFr_ABA04512_0x01000007000017AE.Text: I have the statue of Jizo. Is everything in order now?
ARTICY.DFr_4D0E2B7F_0x0100000700001799.Text: Oh, quite wonderful! You can always count on Souken to find something beautiful. Have you found any trace of the statue?
ARTICY.DFr_ADC2AE1B_0x0100000700001790.Text: I wonder where Jizo went – and why…
ARTICY.DFr_62A16614_0x010000070000177C.MenuText: I have bought add-ons for the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_62A16614_0x010000070000177C.Text: I have bought add-ons for the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_774EDCCA_0x010000070000174D.Text: So? Did you find the statue? Or buy the addons from Souken?
ARTICY.DFr_84D1A62B_0x0100000700001739.Text: Souken the trader might have some nice decorations for sale.  But he's been avoiding the village recently and never crossing to our side of the river. I wonder why.
ARTICY.DFr_87D3D752_0x0100000700001729.Text: Apart from finding Jizo? Well, you can rebuild the shrine better than it was! Maybe that will convince him to reappear.
ARTICY.DFr_0EC29337_0x0100000700001722.MenuText: What can I do to help?
ARTICY.DFr_0EC29337_0x0100000700001722.Text: What can I do to help?
ARTICY.DFr_CA781DF5_0x010000070000171B.Text: One way or another, the village needs him to return. But for now he doesn't even have a home. The shrine is destroyed.
ARTICY.DFr_641AAB2E_0x010000070000170D.Text: The statue disappeared and the shrine is ruined. Perhaps Jizo could no longer stand our ways…
ARTICY.DFr_93EF7269_0x01000007000016FF.Text: One of them, Jizo, simply walked away. It’s never a good sign when a kami decides to leave the people.
ARTICY.DFr_FE176CCB_0x01000007000016F1.Text: Asking the kami for help right now might not work. They’re… troubled.
ARTICY.DFr_69F23AD9_0x01000007000016EA.MenuText: What would kami think if I asked them about settling here?
ARTICY.DFr_69F23AD9_0x01000007000016EA.Text: What would kami think if I asked them about settling here?
ARTICY.DFr_33889B8B_0x01000007000016E3.Text: Others may sometimes listen to me, but only because I speak for the kami.
ARTICY.DFr_F4AEE94A_0x01000007000016CF.MenuText: I heard you are a person of note in the village…
ARTICY.DFr_F4AEE94A_0x01000007000016CF.Text: I heard you are a person of note in the village…
ARTICY.DFr_0D7FCDB7_0x0100000700001429.Text: Please, return the statue it to its rightful place.
ARTICY.DFr_6DD3FF6B_0x010000070000141D.Text: He would be too scared to desecrate the shrine. He probably found it by chance while patrolling the mountains. And now he's bragging about it to show he's mightier than the kami.
ARTICY.DFr_964433BD_0x010000070000140F.Text: There’s something wrong with him. Actually, I think he's lying.
ARTICY.DFr_01BBB07F_0x0100000700001408.MenuText: For not reacting to a robbery in front of the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_01BBB07F_0x0100000700001408.Text: For not reacting to a robbery in front of the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_A327E9DF_0x01000007000013FB.MenuText: I talked to Mamoru – he arrested the statue!
ARTICY.DFr_A327E9DF_0x01000007000013FB.Text: I talked to Mamoru – he arrested the statue!
ARTICY.DFr_83BA3A2E_0x01000007000013E9.Text: Well, it’s a kami after all. With all the powers they have, I suppose they could walk from time to time, couldn’t they?
ARTICY.DFr_BD73DA6D_0x01000007000013DB.Text: Not really. Perhaps a passing stranger took it and nobody noticed. Perhaps the statue went off by itself…
ARTICY.DFr_7B19A0F1_0x01000007000013D4.MenuText: Do you have any theories of your own?
ARTICY.DFr_7B19A0F1_0x01000007000013D4.Text: Do you have any theories of your own?
ARTICY.DFr_8BBE16B0_0x01000007000013CD.Text: Oh, yes. Who could have done such a thing? Nobody in the village, that’s for sure.
ARTICY.DFr_2EAE6828_0x01000007000013C7.MenuText: Miko told me about the Jizo statue which disappeared.
ARTICY.DFr_2EAE6828_0x01000007000013C7.Text: Miko told me about the Jizo statue which disappeared.
ARTICY.DFr_29BE3292_0x01000007000013B7.Text: I knew she would manage. Between you and me, she’s quite brilliant – but don’t tell her I said that.
ARTICY.DFr_66DD59E8_0x01000007000013B1.MenuText: Furi did a wonderful job on the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_66DD59E8_0x01000007000013B1.Text: Furi did a wonderful job on the shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_F79AB9AA_0x01000007000013A1.Text: I hope she does a good job. Maybe Jizo will be more merciful if he sees proper handiwork on display.
ARTICY.DFr_98DE2191_0x010000070000139B.MenuText: Thank you for letting Furi help me.
ARTICY.DFr_98DE2191_0x010000070000139B.Text: Thank you for letting Furi help me.
ARTICY.DFr_DB76C4E9_0x010000070000138A.Text: She'll join you after you begin the reconstruction. And I’ll oversee her work, just in case.
ARTICY.DFr_01983E5A_0x010000070000137C.Text: I guess… I was too harsh. And Jizo has listened to my prayers. Furi came to help me. Working on the shrine could be a good lesson for an apprentice.
ARTICY.DFr_7FBE4690_0x0100000700001376.MenuText: Have you changed your mind about restoring the shrine?
ARTICY.DFr_7FBE4690_0x0100000700001376.Text: Have you changed your mind about restoring the shrine?
ARTICY.DFr_0CA03328_0x0100000700001365.Text: I already gave you my answer.
ARTICY.DFr_187AFF89_0x010000070000135F.MenuText: Would you reconsider helping me restore the shrine?
ARTICY.DFr_187AFF89_0x010000070000135F.Text: Would you reconsider helping me restore the shrine?
ARTICY.DFr_4C70A0E4_0x010000070000134F.Text: Jizo… Jizo left us when we needed him the most. I won't help you.
ARTICY.DFr_84BDFBD4_0x0100000700001349.MenuText: I need your help in restoring the Jizo shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_84BDFBD4_0x0100000700001349.Text: I need your help in restoring the Jizo shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_F1CBCA27_0x0100000700001338.Text: Oh, you still haven't figured it out? It's in a recess blocked with a big stone.
ARTICY.DFr_C443F6E9_0x0100000700001323.Text: What? I'm not mad. It's jailed. In recess near the waterfall, the one on the other side of the village. I blocked the entrance with a stone. It served it's sentence, so you may free it if you want.
ARTICY.DFr_1F2BC4E5_0x0100000700001315.Text: Oh, that’s right. Jizo the protector never reacted when little children were dying because of hunger last winter. Why should he react to a robbery? He had it coming, I’m telling you.
ARTICY.DFr_51DA38AA_0x010000070000130E.MenuText: So... How was it supposed to react?
ARTICY.DFr_51DA38AA_0x010000070000130E.Text: So... How was it supposed to react?
ARTICY.DFr_CE9DE7B5_0x0100000700001307.Text: That merchant Souken told me he was robbed in front of the shrine. Jizo was there and did nothing. It’s dishonorable to witness a crime and do nothing about it. So I arrested it.
ARTICY.DFr_A108560E_0x01000007000012F9.Text: Ah, that. Yes, I arrested it.
ARTICY.DFr_9433F164_0x01000007000012F2.MenuText: Tell me about the Jizo statue.
ARTICY.DFr_9433F164_0x01000007000012F2.Text: Tell me about the Jizo statue.
ARTICY.DFr_9A5A4A5D_0x01000007000012AF.Text: You know, one of the best things about living on the road is that you can get away from some people without having to find an excuse.
ARTICY.DFr_FE9E1F0A_0x01000007000012A8.MenuText: It witnessed the robbery, but didn't react.
ARTICY.DFr_FE9E1F0A_0x01000007000012A8.Text: It witnessed the robbery, but didn’t react.
ARTICY.DFr_C7FD2E48_0x01000007000012A1.Text: Now that’s interesting, even for Mamoru. Did he give any reasons?
ARTICY.DFr_68D22EB2_0x010000070000129B.MenuText: Mamoru says he has arrested the statue.
ARTICY.DFr_68D22EB2_0x010000070000129B.Text: Mamoru says he has arrested the statue.
ARTICY.DFr_CB852AF9_0x010000070000127F.Text: Good luck! Perhaps whoever robbed me is also connected to this theft?
ARTICY.DFr_4FCDE77A_0x0100000700001279.MenuText: I’m looking for the lost statue of Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_4FCDE77A_0x0100000700001279.Text: I’m looking for the lost statue of Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_AEA52C97_0x0100000700001271.Text: Same goes to Jizo himself, of course.
ARTICY.DFr_C2652A97_0x0100000700001261.Text: So I'm guessing you're going to reconstruct the destroyed shrine? Do you think the gods will be kinder to the village when you do?
ARTICY.DFr_E948103F_0x010000070000124E.Text: Luckily, they do, most of the time. Good fortune to you, too!
ARTICY.DFr_761E4632_0x0100000700001248.MenuText: May the kami watch over you.
ARTICY.DFr_761E4632_0x0100000700001248.Text: May the kami watch over you.
ARTICY.Dlg_EBF1EC04_0x010000070000123B.Text: After small talk (nothing more to say)
ARTICY.DFr_BD4E727F_0x010000070000122F.Text: Like everyone these days – the grace of kami. It can’t be bought, though.
ARTICY.DFr_08CDE82F_0x0100000700001228.MenuText: And what do the people here need?
ARTICY.DFr_08CDE82F_0x0100000700001228.Text: And what do the people here need?
ARTICY.DFr_1CAF8D85_0x0100000700001221.Text: Oh, this and that. It all depends on the needs of the people I visit on the way.
ARTICY.DFr_C8D2EF89_0x0100000700001213.Text: You could say that. But I think of myself as a traveler and a servant to kami. Trading is just something that happens in the meantime.
ARTICY.DFr_3EF6798F_0x01000007000011FF.Text: He promised to find the perpetrator. And then did nothing, literally nothing. All talk, no action. Never trusted the man.
ARTICY.DFr_D587328F_0x01000007000011F1.Text: I fell asleep right away. When I woke up, my possessions were gone. I went to complain to Mamoru – he’s supposed to keep the order there.
ARTICY.DFr_5ED3B92A_0x01000007000011E3.Text: I ate some berries growing in front of that same shrine you're working on. I never thought Jizo, the protector of travelers, would allow any harm in his domain. I was wrong.
ARTICY.DFr_FE119075_0x01000007000011D5.Text: Since the bridge was destroyed, crossing the river is a nuisance, for one thing. But that is nothing compared to what happened to me recently.
ARTICY.DFr_B3214274_0x01000007000011C7.Text: Frankly, it used to be a great place, but lately I have been trying to avoid it.
ARTICY.DFr_8A651755_0x01000007000011B9.Text: I do have some. Come trade with me whenever you have the money.
ARTICY.DFr_8BCC955E_0x01000007000011B3.MenuText: I need add-ons for the Jizo shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_8BCC955E_0x01000007000011B3.Text: I need add-ons for the Jizo shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_07F5D64B_0x0100000F00003BB3.Text: นี่ เอาระฆังไป แล้วใช้มันร้องเรียกผู้คน
ARTICY.DFr_FDDED86B_0x0100000F00000695.Text: ยินดีต้อนรับ เจ้านักเดินทาง เจ้าดูเหมือนต้องการเครื่องดื่ม
ARTICY.DFr_53637851_0x0100000F000006AC.MenuText: อาจจะ เจ้ามีอะไรแนะนำข้าไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_53637851_0x0100000F000006AC.Text: อาจจะ เจ้ามีอะไรแนะนำข้าไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_431CEB21_0x0100000D00000DC1.Text: ตราบใดที่เจ้าสามารถจ่ายได้ ว่าแต่ เจ้าแต่งงานแล้วหรือยัง?
ARTICY.DFr_02E701FC_0x0100000D00000DC8.MenuText: ม ไม่ มันไม่ใช่กงการอะไรของเจ้า
ARTICY.DFr_02E701FC_0x0100000D00000DC8.Text: ม ไม่ มันไม่ใช่กงการอะไรของเจ้า
ARTICY.DFr_3C2FD00A_0x0100000D00000DD0.Text: เมื่อเจ้าเป็นเจ้าของร้านเหล้า ทุกอย่างก็กลายเป็นธุระของเจ้า ข้าไม่ได้ตั้งใจจะสอดรู้สอดเห็นนะ แค่ว่า...
ARTICY.DFr_6696D819_0x0100000D00000DD7.Text: ข้ากำลังคิดเรื่องแต่งงานอยู่เหมือนัน ข้าขอคำแนะนำจากทุกคน โซชิโร่คนตัดไม้คนนั้น ผู้ชายดี ๆ ที่เพิ่งเสียภรรยาไปไม่นาน
ARTICY.DFr_99883996_0x0100000D00000DDE.Text: บางครั้งข้าก็ไปหาเขาตอนกลางคืน มันยอดเยี่ยมเสมอ คนหมู่บ้านยอมรับคู่ของเรา เขามีลูกสาวตัวน้อยที่มีเสน่ห์ นางชอบข้า แค่...
ARTICY.DFr_A9B796BC_0x0100000D00000DEB.MenuText: เจ้ายังไม่มั่นใจใช่ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_A9B796BC_0x0100000D00000DEB.Text: เจ้ายังไม่มั่นใจใช่ไหม?
ARTICY.DFr_780939AB_0x0100000D00000DF3.Text: ข้ายังไม่มั่นใจ
ARTICY.DFr_5B1D089E_0x0100000D00000DFA.MenuText: ข้าช่วยอะไรเจ้าไม่ได้เลย...
ARTICY.DFr_5B1D089E_0x0100000D00000DFA.Text: ข้าช่วยอะไรเจ้าไม่ได้เลย...
ARTICY.DFr_D84BEB10_0x0100000D00000E02.Text: ข้ารู้ ข้ารู้
ARTICY.DFr_FE1F5151_0x0100000F00002A66.MenuText: ตอนนี้ข้าสามารถเข้าร่วมการล่าได้หรือยัง?
ARTICY.DFr_FE1F5151_0x0100000F00002A66.Text: ตอนนี้ข้าสามารถเข้าร่วมการล่าได้หรือยัง?
ARTICY.DFr_19157B47_0x0100000B000008D4.Text: กับอะไร? หอก? คันธรูสั้น ๆ เหรอ? ไม่ ข้าไม่สามารถปล่อยเจ้าไปแบบนั้นได้ มันไม่สมควร
ARTICY.DFr_4D3B100B_0x0100000B000008DB.Text: เรายังมีเวลา ข้าจะแสดงวิธีการเตรียมคันธนูที่เหมาะสมให้เจ้าดู
ARTICY.DFr_C1628784_0x0100000F000044CA.Text: ก่อนอื่น เรามาพูดถึงการฟอกหนังกันก่อน ต้องมีอุปกรณ์ที่เหมาะสม...
ARTICY.DFr_FE6F8B46_0x010000120000068E.MenuText: โทชิจิบอกว่า เจ้าอาจมีบางอย่าง ที่ข้าช่วยเจ้าได้
ARTICY.DFr_FE6F8B46_0x010000120000068E.Text: โทชิจิบอกว่า เจ้าอาจมีบางอย่าง ที่ข้าช่วยเจ้าได้
ARTICY.DFr_FB5A1B3A_0x0100001200000695.Text: ใช่ ข้าเห็นแล้วว่าเจ้าทำอะไรได้บ้าง เจ้าสามารถทำให้หมู่บ้านกลับคืนสู่สภาพเดิมได้ เราควรร่วมมือกัน
ARTICY.DFr_A1506C32_0x010000120000069D.MenuText: เจ้าหมายความว่าอย่างไร?
ARTICY.DFr_A1506C32_0x010000120000069D.Text: เจ้าหมายความว่าอย่างไร?
ARTICY.DFr_4F974C34_0x0100000A00000435.Text: ข้ามีความคิดบางอย่าง อย่างเช่น ที่นี่เคยมีสะพาน มันคึกคักมาก เพราะมีนักท่องเที่ยวและพ่อค้า เดินทางไปมาอยู่ตลอด
ARTICY.DFr_F169EA02_0x0100000A00000312.Text: เมื่อโซโซกิถูกเผา กองทัพของชูโกไดอยากให้เราเดินทางกลับมายังหมู่บ้านยากขึ้น... ดังนั้นพวกเขาจึงทำลายสะพานทิ้ง
ARTICY.DFr_CBF41318_0x0100000700003310.MenuText: เราคงจะได้ใช้สะพานนี้ในอนาคต...
ARTICY.DFr_CBF41318_0x0100000700003310.Text: เราคงจะได้ใช้สะพานนี้ในอนาคต...
ARTICY.DFr_2B22B84E_0x0100000700003552.Text: แน่นอน ตอนนี้ในหมู่บ้านเหลือแค่ผู้กอบกู้ซาก กับคนที่ยังอาวรณ์ในความทรงจำ
ARTICY.DFr_7E11D82A_0x0100000700003562.Text: นอกจากนี้...สะพานนั้นยังเป็นพยาน ถึงช่วงเวลาที่สำคัญในชีวิตของข้าด้วย มันมีความหมายกับข้ามาก บางที สักวัน ข้าอาจจะเล่าเรื่องของข้าให้เจ้าฟัง
ARTICY.DFr_02E2F7EC_0x0100000600000ED0.Text: Now go, I have a job to do.
ARTICY.DFr_D0E793BB_0x0100000600000E9C.Text: So you are looking for a job?
ARTICY.DFr_C4E49198_0x0100000600000593.Text: I have nothing more to say to you now.
ARTICY.Dlg_160A92FD_0x0100000600000592.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.Dlg_B7FDC083_0x0100000600000584.DisplayN: Fetch Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_701FA34F_0x0100000600000577.Text: This is a sample Craft Hammer Local quest. Press [...] to continue.
ARTICY.FFr_7BE487AC_0x010000060000056E.DisplayN: Receive Craft Hammer Local Quest Flow
ARTICY.DFr_651A4F56_0x01000006000003A4.Text: I have nothing more to say to you now.
ARTICY.Dlg_FF3968E0_0x01000006000003A3.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_2792E754_0x0100000600000396.Text: You didn't build a House yet.
ARTICY.Dlg_07FC6B3C_0x0100000600000395.DisplayN: Fetch Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_660D964C_0x0100000600000388.Text: This is a sample Build House Stage quest. Press [...] to continue.
ARTICY.FFr_BEBB9E2A_0x010000060000037F.DisplayN: Receive Build House Stage Example Quest Flow
ARTICY.DFr_00FEE3A0_0x0100000600000271.Text: I have nothing more to say to you now.
ARTICY.Dlg_B06DC8DD_0x0100000600000270.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_9A2F61A8_0x0100000600000263.Text: You didn't build Example Special Project yet.
ARTICY.Dlg_6E0155FE_0x0100000600000262.DisplayN: Fetch Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_B9483AB0_0x0100000600000255.Text: This is a sample Special Project quest. Press [...] to continue.
ARTICY.DFr_E08E0190_0x010000060000024E.Text: Hey, build Example Special Project, please.
ARTICY.FFr_FF05A4CE_0x010000060000024C.DisplayN: Receive Special Project Example Quest Flow
ARTICY.DFr_1A02B884_0x01000004000000AA.Text: It was supposed to ease the pain. It didn't.
ARTICY.DFr_1F7A36E6_0x0100000400000063.Text: Takumi? He never said a kind word to me or Hideo. Why do you think he would want to take me as his apprentice?
ARTICY.DFr_B9C5252F_0x0100000300000183.Text: No more talking, back to work.
ARTICY.DFr_4C34C50F_0x0100000300000026.Text: I have nothing more to say to you now.
ARTICY.Dlg_816D7F85_0x0100000300000025.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_34744900_0x0100000300000018.Text: You dont have a hammer and a spear yet.
ARTICY.Dlg_514585B9_0x0100000300000017.DisplayN: Fetch Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_8A0D4C42_0x010000030000000A.Text: This is a sample Have Items quest. Press [...] to continue.
ARTICY.DFr_110EBFE1_0x0100000300000003.Text: Hey, have a hammer and a spear, please.
ARTICY.FFr_5E2B7537_0x0100000300000001.DisplayN: Receive Have Items Example Quest Flow
ARTICY.DFr_E28263D2_0x0100000100004F5A.Text: That’s a great idea. Furi is talented, and it’s time the village appreciated her.
ARTICY.DFr_60AEE6B2_0x0100000100004F54.Text: I talked to Furi. She will make gloves that will help with Takumi’s hands.
ARTICY.DFr_3E39124C_0x0100000100004F44.Text: This is difficult… I have no idea how we could help. But keep your eyes open – maybe something will come up.
ARTICY.DFr_C621F88A_0x0100000100004F3E.Text: Nene says Takumi needs help – he’s getting older, his hands are shaking, and he fears he will become useless. That’s why he is so harsh.
ARTICY.DFr_5F853DC8_0x0100000100004F2E.Text: I think she’s your only hope here.
ARTICY.DFr_BDD0835E_0x0100000100004F0E.Text: She knows more about him than old Takumi himself. If anybody can help you here, it would be her.
ARTICY.DFr_A5081314_0x0100000100004F00.Text: I should have expected that with Takumi. Stubborn as always. Frankly, I’m out of ideas. Perhaps you could talk to his wife Nene.
ARTICY.DFr_68FF5E4F_0x0100000100004EF9.Text: Nothing. He said he’s not convinced and won’t help me.
ARTICY.DFr_2E5B52FF_0x0100000100004EEB.MenuText: I made a hammer. He looked at it...
ARTICY.DFr_2E5B52FF_0x0100000100004EEB.Text: I made a hammer. He looked at it...
ARTICY.DFr_408BDAE5_0x0100000100004EE5.Text: Have you tried to prove yourself to him?
ARTICY.DFr_9F7259A6_0x0100000100004ED0.Text: Go on, talk to him then.
ARTICY.DFr_D4FFCDC5_0x0100000100004EC9.MenuText: I made this hammer and I feel I'm ready.
ARTICY.DFr_D4FFCDC5_0x0100000100004EC9.Text: I made this hammer and I feel I'm ready.
ARTICY.DFr_2838AA7E_0x0100000100004EBC.Text: Have you tried to prove yourself to him?
ARTICY.DFr_C8177681_0x0100000100004EAD.Text: Take your time. He appreciates quality.
ARTICY.DFr_00DC4FDC_0x0100000100004EA0.Text: Have you tried to prove yourself to Takumi?
ARTICY.DFr_97B555CC_0x0100000100004E61.Text: Get better then. Train yourself. And make something useful. Like a hammer, for instance?
ARTICY.DFr_3D736320_0x0100000100004E4F.MenuText: I don't know if I'm skilled enough.
ARTICY.DFr_3D736320_0x0100000100004E4F.Text: I don't know if I'm skilled enough.
ARTICY.DFr_169C483F_0x0100000100004E48.Text: He doesn’t care about words. Maybe you can prove your crafting skills to him?
ARTICY.DFr_51DCA25C_0x0100000100004E3A.Text: Haha! The old geezer will never change. Don’t worry, he’s like that.
ARTICY.DFr_A13F2CBA_0x0100000100004E33.MenuText: Yes. He told me to stop wasting his time.
ARTICY.DFr_A13F2CBA_0x0100000100004E33.Text: Yes. He told me to stop wasting his time.
ARTICY.DFr_6A409494_0x0100000100004E1F.Text: He is very respected here – there are no better craftsmen around. You should go talk to him.
ARTICY.DFr_D5C558AB_0x0100000100004E0E.Text: Perhaps you will find someone who can make use of them. They've been close to Jizo for so long, I'm sure they carry many blessings.
ARTICY.DFr_481D1A88_0x0100000100004E07.MenuText: What should I do with them?
ARTICY.DFr_481D1A88_0x0100000100004E07.Text: What should I do with them?
ARTICY.DFr_297DC5A0_0x0100000100004E00.Text: Thank you… Let me take a look. Oh, the fabric is torn, it would be disrespectful for the kami to wear them.
ARTICY.DFr_C24D5A1E_0x0100000100004DFA.MenuText: I found the ceremonial clothes you made for Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_C24D5A1E_0x0100000100004DFA.Text: I found the ceremonial clothes you made for Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_545FFF34_0x0100000100004DE8.Text: Wonderfully! He has found his peace and he’s back to his old self – the man I fell in love with all these years ago. Thank you again!
ARTICY.DFr_38A0B76D_0x0100000100004DDA.Text: Oh, they argue all the time for the whole village to hear, but when he returns home, he can’t stop talking how great her work is. It’s boring, but I’m patient.
ARTICY.DFr_693533DD_0x0100000100004DD4.MenuText: How are things with Takumi and Furi?
ARTICY.DFr_693533DD_0x0100000100004DD4.Text: How are things with Takumi and Furi?
ARTICY.DFr_7103FD5C_0x0100000100004DC1.Text: Please, do. I do hope the dear old fool will agree…
ARTICY.DFr_F7584BAC_0x0100000100004DBA.MenuText: I’ll go and talk to Takumi.
ARTICY.DFr_F7584BAC_0x0100000100004DBA.Text: I’ll go and talk to Takumi.
ARTICY.DFr_B2F94904_0x0100000100004DB3.Text: You don’t have to tell me that. I know – and that’s another thing Takumi respects. It seems… Jizo has listened to us after all.
ARTICY.DFr_A96416D1_0x0100000100004DA5.Text: No, no, on the contrary! It’s the only sort of people he appreciates! It’ll definitely be fun to watch, though.
ARTICY.DFr_4B4F1750_0x0100000100004D9E.MenuText: Do you think it won’t work?
ARTICY.DFr_4B4F1750_0x0100000100004D9E.Text: Do you think it won’t work?
ARTICY.DFr_96457263_0x0100000100004D97.Text: Furi…? She’s as wild and stubborn as him!
ARTICY.DFr_5986C22C_0x0100000100004D90.MenuText: Furi wants to become his apprentice.
ARTICY.DFr_5986C22C_0x0100000100004D90.Text: Furi wants to become his apprentice.
ARTICY.DFr_6411CB62_0x0100000100004D8A.Text: Have you found a way to help Takumi?
ARTICY.DFr_381F998A_0x0100000100004D6B.Text: Perhaps nothing can be done after all…
ARTICY.DFr_4A7070CF_0x0100000100004D5E.Text: Have you found a way to help Takumi?
ARTICY.DFr_ECD9E4F6_0x0100000100004D40.Text: I hope so… He needs to feel useful. If you find a way that could also let him rest a bit, he can finally be happy. I can finally be happy.
ARTICY.DFr_1D4C8E55_0x0100000100004D32.Text: It only confirmed his fears. He feels gods have abandoned him.
ARTICY.DFr_7F36705D_0x0100000100004D24.Text: We would always pray to him… And one day the statue disappeared. I think the samurai desecrated it. We only noticed it the following day…
ARTICY.DFr_966AADF3_0x0100000100004D16.Text: Takumi feels the village will perish when he stops working. If he had someone to teach, things would be different.
ARTICY.DFr_87462A5F_0x0100000100004D08.Text: Oh, we did. Four of them. All dead within a year. It's... hard to bear, but the gods must have had their reasons. For each one I made a new set of ceremonial clothes for the Jizo statue.
ARTICY.DFr_240FF787_0x0100000100004CDE.Text: Oh, yes. Not just any craftsman – the best in the region. And he always HAS to be the best. Even now.
ARTICY.DFr_57C4D1EE_0x0100000100004CD7.MenuText: It must be terrible for a craftsman like him.
ARTICY.DFr_57C4D1EE_0x0100000100004CD7.Text: It must be terrible for a craftsman like him.
ARTICY.DFr_3C0DD443_0x0100000100004CD0.Text: The shaking is so strong it hinders his work. Old age has its laws, and you learn to accept them. But not him…
ARTICY.DFr_BEE91E2D_0x0100000100004CC2.Text: His hands have started shaking. We have no children to take over the workshop, and there’s the business with the Jizo statue…
ARTICY.DFr_0F608F0D_0x0100000100004CB4.Text: Oh, he’s always like that. I love him, but I know he can be an obnoxious fool. Forgive him, he has his problems.
ARTICY.DFr_7D532E44_0x0100000100004CA6.Text: …and the old grouch told you to go away, right?
ARTICY.DFr_58037450_0x0100000100004CA0.MenuText: I was talking to your husband about settling here…
ARTICY.DFr_58037450_0x0100000100004CA0.Text: I was talking to your husband about settling here…
ARTICY.DFr_186CEE73_0x0100000100004C8A.Text: How are you doing, young man? Have a good day!
ARTICY.DFr_F283DD08_0x0100000100004C78.Text: I’m learning new things all the time. Just like I always wanted. Thank you for your help!
ARTICY.DFr_1581D7C3_0x0100000100004C6A.Text: No, it’s amazing! You couldn’t argue with Mamoru – he was always right and told you to shut up. And Takumi only pretends not to listen – but he does.
ARTICY.DFr_2742C976_0x0100000100004C5C.Text: He has to be the most irritating man in the village! We argue all the time!
ARTICY.DFr_B5CCE1D0_0x0100000100004C36.Text: Please, do it as quickly as you can. I’ll go crazy waiting here like this…
ARTICY.DFr_E4E4D38E_0x0100000100004C29.Text: Have you given the gloves to Takumi? I’m so nervous…
ARTICY.DFr_E2BE2D8D_0x0100000100004C12.Text: Here they are. Give them to the old man. With my best regards. I hope he’ll like them…
ARTICY.DFr_677731F1_0x0100000100004C06.Text: Give me a couple of hours.
ARTICY.DFr_A4564BD2_0x0100000100004BFF.MenuText: Yes, I can see you like it. When will you be ready with the gloves?
ARTICY.DFr_A4564BD2_0x0100000100004BFF.Text: Yes, I can see you like it. When will it be ready?
ARTICY.DFr_8AF5AB24_0x0100000100004BF8.Text: That’s beautiful handiwork… Just look at the threads...
ARTICY.DFr_0BE0359E_0x0100000100004BC9.Text: Do you have the ceremonial clothes Nene made for Jizo? I want to start working on gloves for Takumi.
ARTICY.DFr_E9AE39D6_0x0100000100004BB1.Text: Oh, yes... for all the children they have lost... That's brilliant! Go find them!
ARTICY.DFr_2E306A4D_0x0100000100004BA9.MenuText: Nene mentioned she made ceremonial clothes for Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_2E306A4D_0x0100000100004BA9.Text: Nene mentioned she made ceremonial clothes for Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_EFD08F10_0x0100000100004B9A.Text: Actually, I think I might know just the thing.
ARTICY.DFr_8B7D28B8_0x0100000100004B92.Text: I need a special fabric. Something personal. Something sanctified with love. Blessed by the kami.
ARTICY.DFr_27BCEE81_0x0100000100004B8B.Text: I’ll make a pair that will bless his hands – with love.
ARTICY.DFr_F5570990_0x0100000100004B7C.Text: Not just to keep him warm.
ARTICY.DFr_9E425F63_0x0100000100004B72.Text: You're good with fabrics, right? How about you make him some gloves?
ARTICY.DFr_98F89598_0x0100000100004B66.MenuText: I noticed his hands are shaking...
ARTICY.DFr_98F89598_0x0100000100004B66.Text: I noticed his hands are shaking... He's ashamed people are noticing.
ARTICY.DFr_C2DFAC11_0x0100000100004B52.Text: It should not be just to conceal the shaking.
ARTICY.DFr_AD6C5477_0x0100000100004B3D.MenuText: We need something that could be of use for him.
ARTICY.DFr_AD6C5477_0x0100000100004B3D.Text: We need something that could be of use for him.
ARTICY.DFr_EA1CDF49_0x0100000100004B36.Text: But how do I prove my talent?
ARTICY.DFr_A885A32A_0x0100000100004B2F.Text: Takumi is not good with kind words, but he appreciates talent. And you ARE talented. You just have to prove it.
ARTICY.DFr_187A9D0D_0x0100000100004B0D.MenuText: Nene tells me Takumi is looking for somebody that could take over his work.
ARTICY.DFr_187A9D0D_0x0100000100004B0D.Text: Nene tells me Takumi is looking for somebody that could take over his work.
ARTICY.DFr_A72FA883_0x0100000100004AEE.Text: But finally there’s hope somebody could take over, then I’ll have a good rest. For a day or two, eh?
ARTICY.DFr_232706CC_0x0100000100004AE6.Text: Q12 9 After completing quest, he's happy to have someone to teach
ARTICY.DFr_2A64E3A3_0x0100000100004ADE.Text: The village always needs new tools, so I’m working, as usual.
ARTICY.DFr_2F4B9094_0x0100000100004AC9.Text: I’ve got work to do, and you keep wasting my time.
ARTICY.DFr_597CFE89_0x0100000100004AC3.MenuText: I wanted to give you a gift...
ARTICY.DFr_597CFE89_0x0100000100004AC3.Text: I wanted to give you a gift, but now I think I’ve lost it somewhere.
ARTICY.DFr_C89C7658_0x0100000100004AA9.Text: You're welcome in the village. You can tell that to anyone.
ARTICY.DFr_DB79BE41_0x0100000100004AA2.Text: Like... Listen, don't go fishing for praise. I have work to do.
ARTICY.DFr_2BEB9AD6_0x0100000100004A8C.Text: Tell her to come and see me... or better yet, I’ll go tell her myself. Where is she?
ARTICY.DFr_6FCA681F_0x0100000100004A82.Text: Ah, yes, I know the place. And you... Your hands aren't too capable, but I guess we could use someone... like that.
ARTICY.DFr_B94060FF_0x0100000100004A7B.MenuText: In the cave by the crossroads.
ARTICY.DFr_B94060FF_0x0100000100004A7B.Text: In the cave by the crossroads.
ARTICY.DFr_E0BBEE17_0x0100000100004A74.Text: Well... I may be old and weak, but I can teach her a thing or two.
ARTICY.DFr_63D6E445_0x0100000100004A6D.MenuText: She needs a place in the village.
ARTICY.DFr_63D6E445_0x0100000100004A6D.Text: She needs a place in the village. And she'd like to become your apprentice.
ARTICY.DFr_4408714C_0x0100000100004A58.Text: That she does. They’re… they’re very comfortable. She's a good girl.
ARTICY.DFr_5D1D4FB5_0x0100000100004A51.Text: Please, accept them. They were made by Furi, and she knows her craft.
ARTICY.DFr_4CA2252C_0x0100000100004A43.Text: Please, take these blessed gloves. They will help you with your hands… They are made from your offerings for Jizo.
ARTICY.DFr_88B7B298_0x0100000100004A3C.Text: I don’t need gifts. I need time to work.
ARTICY.DFr_30522725_0x0100000100004A36.MenuText: I have brought you a gift.
ARTICY.DFr_30522725_0x0100000100004A36.Text: I have brought you a gift.
ARTICY.DFr_94515D7D_0x0100000100004A27.Text: We’re hungry here. We don't need another mouth to feed.
ARTICY.DFr_3C5EE90D_0x0100000100004A20.Text: The village already has one, and that would be me.
ARTICY.DFr_20734D4B_0x0100000100004A0B.Text: You wanted to prove you could be a craftsman?
ARTICY.DFr_2C1C4036_0x01000001000049FD.Text: Look. You’ve made a hammer. And my answer is still no.
ARTICY.DFr_7BD2CC05_0x01000001000049F6.MenuText: Doesn't it prove I can be helpful for the village?
ARTICY.DFr_7BD2CC05_0x01000001000049F6.Text: Doesn't it prove I can be helpful for the village?
ARTICY.DFr_EAF0A213_0x01000001000049D3.Text: The village needs tools, I make them, you’re interrupting my work. Go.
ARTICY.DFr_B107E40B_0x01000001000049C4.Text: Now can you? The village has managed without your help for years. Everybody has a role here and I don’t see what yours could be. Go.
ARTICY.DFr_2A721652_0x010000010000347A.Text: Hopes Miko finds the add-ons to her liking.
ARTICY.Dlg_A5D4A431_0x0100000100003161.Text: After quest complete, happy how things turned out
ARTICY.Dlg_F4F925E5_0x0100000100003144.Text: Still didn't give gloves to Takumi
ARTICY.Dlg_66000342_0x010000010000307B.Text: Still didn't give her the Ceremonial Clothes
ARTICY.Dlg_43D4942F_0x010000010000306C.Text: You give her Ceremonial Clothes. After Fadeout get Blessed Gloves and FetchMitts quest
ARTICY.Dlg_597CA5EE_0x010000010000305E.Text: You convince her to leave Mamoru and join Takumi as apprentice. You come up with a plan (gloves, shaking hands). Receive GetClothes quest. Complete Q12HelpTakumi and Q14HelpFuri.

ARTICY.DFr_EA5C8A37_0x0100000100002D2B.Text: Q12 2 Nene explains Takumi's harsh behavior, talk about the Ceremonial Clothes. Complete TalkToNene. Get "Find a way to help Takumi"
ARTICY.Dlg_6CAB1F53_0x0100000100002D23.Text: Nene explains Takumi's harsh behavior, talk about the Ceremonial Clothes, get "Find a way to help Takumi"
ARTICY.DFr_A366615B_0x0100000100002D15.Text: Q12 6 You found the Ceremonial Clothes, but they are destroyed. She doesn't want them. Maybe someone else will find use for them.
ARTICY.Dlg_25833788_0x0100000100002D0D.Text: You found the Ceremonial Clothes, but they are destroyed. She doesn't want them. Maybe someone else will find use for them.
ARTICY.DFr_AB94EFC0_0x0100000100002CED.Text: Q12 3 You still don't know how to help Takumi
ARTICY.Dlg_28C06204_0x0100000100002CEC.Text: You still don't know how to help Takumi
ARTICY.DFr_160E5441_0x0100000100002CD7.Text: Q12 4 After you talked to Furi, hopes the plan will work out.
ARTICY.Dlg_C8EB98EF_0x0100000100002CD6.Text: After you talked to Furi, hopes the plan will work out.
ARTICY.DFr_7A167105_0x0100000100002CC8.Text: Q12 5 After completing quest, happy with how things turned out.
ARTICY.Dlg_2F37A680_0x0100000100002CC0.Text: After completing quest, happy with how things turned out

ARTICY.Dlg_E467357E_0x0100000100002C6C.Text: After Takumi dismissed you, she advises you to impress him with crafting skills (get CraftHammer and GetWoC).
ARTICY.DFr_84453970_0x0100000100002C3A.Text: Q12 9 After doing the crafting tasks you still haven't talked to Takumi
ARTICY.Dlg_64F0D945_0x0100000100002C39.Text: After doing the crafting tasks, you still haven't talked to Takumi
ARTICY.DFr_B0CD2C0C_0x0100000100002C18.Text: Q12 3 There still at least one crafting  quest outstanding
ARTICY.Dlg_F2F2FA20_0x0100000100002C17.Text: There's still at least one crafting  quest outstanding
ARTICY.DFr_F7BE6B4B_0x0100000100002BE2.Text: Q12 4 Gives up, advises you to talk to Nene. Get TalkToNene. Complete TalkToTatsukoAgain
ARTICY.Dlg_52DA307A_0x0100000100002BE1.Text: Gives up, advises you to talk to Nene. Get TalkToNene. Complete TalkToTatsukoAgain
ARTICY.DFr_17177494_0x0100000100002BCB.Text: Q12 5 Still haven't talked to Nene
ARTICY.DFr_78849CBF_0x0100000100002BAE.Text: Q12 6 She has no idea how to help Takumi, suggests you should have your ears and eyes open
ARTICY.Dlg_5811DA23_0x0100000100002BAD.Text: No idea how to help Takumi.
ARTICY.DFr_6C65DFD5_0x0100000100002BA5.Text: Good idea with Furi and the gloves! Kudoz.
ARTICY.Dlg_7D398008_0x0100000100002B9C.Text: Good idea with Furi and the gloves! Kudoz.
ARTICY.DFr_9A4786B5_0x0100000100002B71.Text: Q12 2 Takumi dismisses you, get Talk to Tatsuko. Complete TalkToTakumi
ARTICY.Dlg_B4C78718_0x0100000100002B70.Text: Q12 2 Takumi dismisses you, get Talk to Tatsuko. Complete TalkToTakumi
ARTICY.DFr_747A4FA1_0x0100000100002B3E.Text: Q12 3 You crafted a hammer and levelled up WoC. Not impressed. Complete TalkToTakumi Again. Get TalkToTatsukoAgain
ARTICY.Dlg_443B68D1_0x0100000100002B36.Text: Q12 3 You crafted a hammer and levelled up WoC. Not impressed. Complete TalkToTakumi Again. Get TalkToTatsukoAgain
ARTICY.DFr_A4452369_0x0100000100002B0B.Text: You give him the blessed gloves and talk about Furi, he agrees to take her in, and is grateful to you. Complete Q12FetchMitts
ARTICY.DFr_C43B05B3_0x0100000100002B04.Text: Q12 10 You lost the gloves somewhere along the way
ARTICY.Dlg_9D01854C_0x0100000100002AFC.Text: After completing quest, he's happy to have someone to teach
ARTICY.DFr_BD9F700A_0x0100000100002AC6.Text: You need to find addons and statue.
ARTICY.Dlg_4A84E6B7_0x0100000100002AC5.Text: You still need to find addons and statue.
ARTICY.Dlg_883E2D66_0x0100000100002AAB.Text: Happy to hear you found the statue. You still need the shrine add-ons.
ARTICY.DFr_E492AA6C_0x0100000100002AA4.Text: Happy to hear you found the statue. You still need the shrine add-ons.
ARTICY.Dlg_D0920CE3_0x010000010000294A.Text: Nothing more to say (already discussed Mamoru
ARTICY.Dlg_A013082B_0x0100000100002740.Text: You lost the gloves somewhere along the way
ARTICY.Dlg_5B123C32_0x01000001000026C7.Text: You give him the blessed gloves and talk about Furi, he agrees to take her in, and is grateful to you. Complete Q12FetchMitts and Handshaking.
ARTICY.Dlg_441D25D5_0x0100000100002202.Text: Ask for his help in restoring the shrine, he disagrees (before Handshaking is complete).
ARTICY.Dlg_F739AB74_0x01000001000021F9.Text: Ask for his help in restoring the shrine, he sends Furi to help you, as part of apprenticeship, he'll oversee her work (after Handshaking is complete).
ARTICY.Dlg_076C49B7_0x01000001000021DC.Text: Q13 4 Good luck with the shrine
ARTICY.Dlg_C886B0F6_0x01000001000021BE.Text: Q13 4 Great to hear Furi managed to build the shrine, she's getting better everyday
ARTICY.DFr_A0B60EB2_0x0100000100002193.Text: Mamoru tells his story about Souken and the Disappearing Statue. Gives Jizo location. Complete Q13TalkToMamoru and Q13FindInfoJizo, receive Q13GetJizo
ARTICY.DFr_A4E6D216_0x010000010000218B.Text: The Jizo disappearance is mysterious. Gives her theory about it, tries to help (she's comically unhelpful).
ARTICY.DFr_C62AC722_0x0100000100002183.Text: Good luck restoring Jizo's reign! Comments on Mamoru's Jizo story (suggest he would be scared to desacrate Jizo etc)
ARTICY.DFr_4E0F5EC4_0x01000001000020EA.Text: Q13 10 All quests complete, looks like you should talk to Tadaaki about settling.
ARTICY.Dlg_BA336379_0x01000001000020E9.Text: Seems like all quests are complete, you should talk to Tadaaki about settling.
ARTICY.DFr_014C25C8_0x01000001000020D8.Text: All quests complete, looks like you should talk to Tadaaki about settling. Get Q13TalkToTadaaki for final chapter dialogue
ARTICY.DFr_BA2947C9_0x01000001000020CA.Text: Q13 11 Quest still complete. Good luck convincing others.
ARTICY.DFr_D9F2F729_0x01000001000020C2.Text: Q13 7 Happy to hear you've rebuild the shrine. You should make an offering on it.
ARTICY.DFr_94A62191_0x01000001000020BA.Text: Q13 6 Glad Takumi will help. Now go rebuild that shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_46BFCBA9_0x01000001000020B2.Text: Q13 5 You still haven't convinced Takumi.
ARTICY.Dlg_7D9C6A12_0x0100000100001FA4.Text: Glad Takumi will help. Now go rebuild that shrine.
ARTICY.DFr_AA339759_0x0100000100001F6D.Text: You'll need a skilled craftsman. Get TalkToTakumi. Complete Q13TalkToMikoAgain.
ARTICY.DFr_E9A2CBCF_0x0100000100001F61.Text: Happy to hear you found the statue and add-ons. You should reconstruct the shrine now.
ARTICY.DFr_6EC690D2_0x0100000100001F54.Text: Happy to hear you have the addons. You still need the statue.
ARTICY.DFr_3379EDF6_0x0100000100001F1A.Text: You learn about the runaway statue. Receive Q13BuyAddons and Q13FindInfoJizo. Complete Q13TalkToMiko (if active).
ARTICY.DFr_7BE7E55E_0x0100000100001F08.Text: Miko and gods are thankful and welcome you to the village. Completes Q13TalkToMikoFinal and Disappearing Statue.
ARTICY.Dlg_0BD8BF69_0x0100000100001EB5.Text: Seems like all quests complete, look like you should talk to Tadaaki about settling. Get Q13TalkToTadaaki for final chapter dialogue
ARTICY.Dlg_1779795B_0x0100000100001A32.Text: Talk about shrine add-ons and buy them. Get "Talk to Mamoru". Complete "BuyAddons" and get "Talk to Mamoru" if you have money.
ARTICY.Dlg_80280233_0x01000001000019FA.Text: Discuss what you've learned about Mamoru's involvement with the Jizo statue debacle.
ARTICY.Dlg_83FFDD4B_0x01000001000019C4.Text: Small talk, introduction to the character
ARTICY.Dlg_E4D5A12C_0x010000010000194E.Text: The Jizo disappearance is mysterious. Gives her theories about it, tries to help (she's comically unhelpful).
ARTICY.Dlg_C353F750_0x0100000100001946.Text: Good luck restoring Jizo's reign! Comments on Mamoru's Jizo story (suggest he would be scared to desacrate Jizo etc)
ARTICY.Dlg_890CC97D_0x010000010000191D.Text: Mamoru tells his story about Souken and the Disappearing Statue. Gives Jizo location. Complete Q13TalkToMamoru and Q13FindInfoJizo, receive Q13GetJizo
ARTICY.Dlg_C9D91AB8_0x01000001000018F2.Text: You learn about the runaway statue. Receive Q13BuyAddons and Q13FindInfoJizo. Complete Q13TalkToMiko (if active).
ARTICY.Dlg_B74862C4_0x01000001000018CF.Text: Happy to hear you found the addons. You still need the statue.
ARTICY.Dlg_DDC0FBA3_0x01000001000018C1.Text: Happy to hear you found the statue and add-ons. You should reconstruct the shrine now. You'll need a skilled craftsman. Get TalkToTakumi. Complete Q13TalkToMikoAgain.
ARTICY.Dlg_E4041D88_0x01000001000018AD.Text: Happy to hear you've rebuild the shrine. You should make an offering on it.
ARTICY.Dlg_7C19189E_0x0100000100001898.Text: Miko and gods are thankful and welcome you to the village. Completes Q13TalkToMikoFinal and Disappearing Statue.
ARTICY.Dlg_E9065B4A_0x0100000100001817.Text: Q13 Disappearing Statue still complete. Good luck convincing others.
ARTICY.Chr_Manfred_0x01000001000010C6.Text:
Manfred is the protagonist and player character. 
He was just a usual game designer and lived a happy life, until he tried to create a game with a truly non-linear storyline. In the end he had a nervous breakdown and admitted himself to a mental home.

ARTICY.DFr_70D2709D_0x0100000F0000273E.Text: ข้าไม่สามารถสร้างสะพานขึ้นมาใหม่คนเดียวได้
ARTICY.DFr_42877853_0x01000012000006A7.Text: ฟังนะ ถ้าเจ้าหาที่พักในหมู่บ้านของเจ้าให้ข้าได้ ข้ายินดีจะเข้าร่วม
ARTICY.DFr_03A59931_0x0100000F00002746.Text: ข้าจะทำทุกอย่างที่ทำได้ เพื่อให้ได้เห็นผู้คนกลับมาใช้สะพาน แล้วทำให้หมู่บ้านมีชีวิตชีวาอีกครั้ง

ARTICY.FFr_99D3BDD0_0x0100000000004B2D.Text: Villagers won't let you settle. You go out of your way to convince them, by repairing a shrine, finding an apprentice for the carpenter and disarming a border crisis.
ARTICY.DFr_F6040D95_0x0100000000004ACD.Text: [Girl] Hope you like your meat rare!
ARTICY.DFr_1AEB28AD_0x0100000000004AAF.Text: [Girl] Here you go hungry man, eat up.
ARTICY.DFr_6EF5FF6A_0x010000000000482D.Text: [Girl] And now – time for a roast! Sit down, it'll take a while.
ARTICY.DFr_7F87B664_0x0100000000004826.Text: [Girl] You KILLED a deer, ok? A majestic, innocent creature. Hope you at least have some splinters.
ARTICY.DFr_9ED3CD47_0x0100000000004814.Text: [Girl] Stop talking, wise-ass stranger man. Get. Me. The. Meat.
ARTICY.DFr_1B8D4B36_0x010000000000480A.Text: [Girl] If you pity him, you can always try hunting. Me, I don't really like killing animals.
ARTICY.DFr_734C69F4_0x01000000000047F2.Text: [Girl] Ok, righteous stranger man. Just don't come crying when you die of hunger.
ARTICY.DFr_0E8BEADB_0x01000000000047E9.Text: [Girl] See? He's gone now! Go get two slices of raw meat, we're gonna prepare a nice meal for you. And me.
ARTICY.DFr_238318AD_0x01000000000047E2.Text: [Girl] Go to that butcher stall other there, by the tree. Guy regularly leaves his post to talk up the bucket vendor.
ARTICY.DFr_C7532F34_0x01000000000047D9.Text: [You] Sigh. Staying in the forest for too long might have made me lose touch. And I guess I'm a bit hungry. Been on a root diet for many days now.
ARTICY.DFr_ED7305AE_0x01000000000047D2.Text: [Girl] Have you eaten a wrong mushroom? Some of them make people act... like you just now.
ARTICY.DFr_4D6498F5_0x01000000000047CA.Text: [You]  Not interested in an eligible widower with an adolescent daughter nearly your age?
ARTICY.DFr_15037F05_0x01000000000047BA.Text: [You] What do you expect? I'm starving. I haven't eaten anything but gobo roots for days.
ARTICY.DFr_A659FC5C_0x01000000000047B3.Text: [Girl] Cutting straight to the chase, are we?
ARTICY.DFr_6D8E82E8_0x01000000000047AA.Text: [You] Thanks, but I've had enough of root vegetables for at least a month. I'd sure fancy some meat though.
ARTICY.DFr_FE7F7202_0x0100000000004704.Text: [Girl] Ok, sad stranger man. I know what you're after. You can have my carrot.
ARTICY.DFr_F0FCE47C_0x01000000000046FC.Text: [You] Did I mention I sleep in the forest and live off of gobo roots? Looks are not my biggest concern.
ARTICY.DFr_D8655E7C_0x01000000000046F5.Text: [Girl] Oh, serious stranger man. Are you going to cry? Not a good look.
ARTICY.DFr_88F1B683_0x0100000000004678.Text: [You] Just roaming the land, as I do.
ARTICY.DFr_B4EAFFDE_0x0100000000004671.Text: [Girl] Oh, serious man is back. Can I help you?
ARTICY.Dlg_15B1B3B6_0x0100000000004670.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_AA1785E2_0x0100000000004634.Text: [You] I stole it. Wasn't too difficult.
ARTICY.DFr_5F694777_0x010000000000462D.Text: [Girl] Thank you meat boy, that's super. So have you stolen? Have you killed?
ARTICY.DFr_DB5D5D3E_0x010000000000460E.Text: [Girl] I'm keeping the fire on. Hurry up slow stranger man, we need two pieces of raw meat.
ARTICY.Dlg_D7081C3D_0x010000000000460D.DisplayN: Fetch Meat Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_B8A566A5_0x010000000000458C.Text: This is a branching dialogue with a fetch quest and Relationship Point awards. Press [...] to continue.
ARTICY.DFr_E5E4CD25_0x0100000000004561.Text: [You] But you're alright with eating them?
ARTICY.DFr_54FA1912_0x010000000000455A.Text: [Girl] He has it coming. Touchy, feely, filthy pig.
ARTICY.DFr_6739F982_0x0100000000004553.Text: [Girl] Girl gotta eat. And if he complains ask if he wants us to eat him next time.
ARTICY.DFr_A2C0CEC8_0x010000000000454B.Text: [You] I don't steal, nor do I want to bring shame upon my family.
ARTICY.DFr_A612A845_0x0100000000004543.Text: [You] Good idea. I like your style.
ARTICY.DFr_6A3A9FE5_0x010000000000453C.Text: [Girl] Ok, I might be able to help, so listen carefully, pityful stranger man. Here's what you need to do.
ARTICY.DFr_FCC52526_0x010000000000452C.Text: [You] My wife died. My parents died. My daughter hates me.
ARTICY.DFr_3F96E4CD_0x0100000000004526.Text: [Girl] Why the long face, stranger man?
ARTICY.DFr_CACB3F20_0x010000000000388A.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.

ARTICY.DFr_80D79FC3_0x0100000000003670.Text: Hey there. Nice to meet you. Come to me any time to talk.
ARTICY.DFr_FD6A90EA_0x0100000000003578.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.Dlg_10FE8BA3_0x0100000000003577.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_21551C3B_0x010000000000355C.Text: You didn't craft a Decent Hammer yet.
ARTICY.Dlg_E288BAE8_0x010000000000355B.DisplayN: Craft Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_1E054CF0_0x010000000000354E.Text: Hey, craft a Decent Hammer, please.
ARTICY.DFr_B30B619D_0x010000000000353C.Text: [You] Let me know when you’re done.
ARTICY.DFr_6183E32F_0x0100000000003532.Text: [You] [Tap him on the back] You’re welcome.
ARTICY.DFr_3FBEB389_0x010000000000352B.Text: [You] I promise I’ll make it up to you later.
ARTICY.DFr_2DEB3624_0x0100000000003523.Text: [You] Sorry about that, times are tough.
ARTICY.DFr_6936A196_0x0100000000003514.Text: [You] Yeah. I have nothing else to pay you with.
ARTICY.DFr_C5A5C931_0x01000000000034F2.Text: [You] Oh, will you cut it out. I’ll get you the axe.
ARTICY.DFr_343AA424_0x01000000000034D7.Text: [You] But don’t get your hopes up.
ARTICY.DFr_15C57E84_0x01000000000034CF.Text: [You] If I stumble upon an axe, I’ll get it for you, ok?
ARTICY.DFr_A7F62014_0x01000000000034C7.Text: [You] [sigh] Fussy workers these days, let me tell you.
ARTICY.DFr_1B416B7A_0x01000000000034BF.Text: [You] Sure, I’ll look around. Don't you worry.
ARTICY.DFr_7D5EE9C8_0x01000000000034B8.Text: [Worker] Can you get me a better decent axe?
ARTICY.DFr_41284074_0x01000000000034B0.Text: [Worker] Even if I risk working with it, I’ll never make it in time.
ARTICY.DFr_0B2809FE_0x01000000000034A6.MenuText: I don’t want you hurting yourself.
ARTICY.DFr_0B2809FE_0x01000000000034A6.Text: [You] Right. I don’t want you hurting yourself.
ARTICY.DFr_12FFDD02_0x01000000000034A0.MenuText: Make sure it doesn’t go flying.
ARTICY.DFr_12FFDD02_0x01000000000034A0.Text: [You] Well, just make sure it doesn’t go flying towards somebody’s head.
ARTICY.DFr_96154135_0x0100000000003498.Text: [Worker] It’s just that this axe is blunt and I feel it’s going to fall apart any minute.
ARTICY.DFr_B3A97282_0x010000000000343F.Text: I have nothing more to say to you now.
ARTICY.Dlg_87F9C8DF_0x010000000000343E.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
ARTICY.DFr_143554B0_0x0100000000003431.Text: Thanks a lot! Here is your reward.
ARTICY.DFr_5A004C2D_0x0100000000003423.Text: You don't have a Shoddy Hammer, a Mediocre Hammer and a Decent Hammer yet.
ARTICY.Dlg_8BAA07CD_0x0100000000003422.DisplayN: Fetch Hammer Quest not yet Completable
ARTICY.DFr_B46BD756_0x0100000000003415.Text: Hey, bring me a Shoddy Hammer, a Mediocre Hammer and a Decent Hammer, please.
ARTICY.DFr_EAA2153C_0x0100000000003407.Text: [Worker] Thank you sensei, this looks incredible! It cuts into wood like it’s a lump of rice. I’ll give it back once I’m finished.
ARTICY.DFr_6DC76061_0x01000000000033FF.Text: [Worker] I can’t work like this, seriously.
ARTICY.DFr_CF9C3DD2_0x01000000000033EE.Text: [Worker] Sensei, I won’t be able to finish work on that cart today.
ARTICY.Dlg_8CAB428A_0x010000000000339E.Text: I have nothing more to say to you for now.
